title: Safe-Release.Recommend.Input
description: Input messageType for the Safe-Release.Recommend capability.

dataset.description: Tabular dataset represented as an array of objects.

intended_purpose.description: Purpose for which the dataset is intended to be released (e.g., analytics, research, vendor processing).

regulatory_frameworks.description: Applicable regulatory or policy frameworks (e.g., CPRA, HIPAA, NIST, A2A).

risk_tolerance.description: Risk tolerance level for the release.

context.description: Optional context from the requesting agent.
